QAPair.Question: Do you have information about D and C
QAPair.Answer: D and C (dilation and curettage) is a procedure to scrape and collect the tissue (endometrium) from inside the uterus. Dilation (D) is a widening of the cervix to allow instruments into the uterus., Curettage (C) is the scraping of tissue from the walls of the uterus.,
